title: Problems with my league!!!!!!!!!!!
body: When I'm in game my league happens to crash and my whole laptop freezes, and I cant do anything. So i end up having to hold down the off button, and when it loads back up, I open league and my laptop continues to freeze!! Now i have 5 low prio queues due to something that wasn't my fault!! riot wtf are you doing, fix all the problems so i can properly play the game and be happy that there's nothing wrong with it!!! acc name is FISHAY. and this seems to happen alot lately!!

replies.body: wow so useful riot, thanks for all the help! Oh wait, you havent done your job properly welllll that's NOT a first..
